attributes.description:
Everything keeps going right TOYOTA - Sportier, fresher Auris
So it looks a lot better, but how does the Auris drive? The answer can be summed up by one word: good. It has a bit of a sporty edge which is great if you are a spirited driver. Toyota?s bullet-proof engine
Very economical and spacious for the whole family. Supporting a reverse camera and heated seats which come fitted as standard. There is also cruise control, keyless entry and start, Bluetooth audio, USB port, touchscreen infotainment system and leather seats. Safety features include seven airbags, ABS and EDB. This one is yours for the taking. With a full condition and roadworthy report from Dekra. Please note the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.title: 2014 Toyota Auris 1.6 XR Auto

attributes.description: STYLISH AND SPORTY - Inside and out, the redesign brings the classic MINI shape up to par and beyond in several areas, including refinement, interior materials, standard and optional features, and general comfort. The MINI is still a very small car, but it's one that's improving with the years, while keeping the distinctive looks, cheeky character, and roller-skate handling of previous generations very much intact. On the outside, only the longer nose really betrays the complete redesign. It's gained slightly in every dimension, and visually, a longer hood and less stubby front indicate the new crash structures and stronger bodyshell underneath. But the upright windshield, long roof, horizontal window line, and oval front lights all still resemble the MINI. The interior is where the most visible changes have come. The ergonomics are cleaned up, with a tachometer and speedometer behind the steering wheel at last, and the large round central dashboard shape now solely a display screen. Three rotating knobs handle the ventilation system, and overall it's simply much easier to understand how the controls work. With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.title: 2015 MINI Clubman Cooper S Auto

attributes.description: TIME TO TAKE THE QUANTUM LEAP -  ATTENTION!!! A 2 year WARRANTY is included in this price. What does the 2019 Toyota Quantum 2.5 D-4D LWB F/C P/V have to offer you. The overall length and passenger space has increased and there's a bit more leg room and improved seating comfort. At the front the Quantum has LED daytime running lights, fog lights and color-coded bumpers. There are also 16-inch steel wheels, as well as new large mirrors which are power retractable. Ride quality, all-important for a vehicle that’s main job is transporting passengers has been significantly improved thanks to new suspension. The additional width and length of the vehicle also adds to the passenger comfort levels, with better legroom and headroom, while the sliding door has been made 70mm wider for easier access. Active safety systems include Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD), which ensure that the maximum braking power is produced without locking the tyres and distributes optimal braking force to the left and right wheels. Vehicle Stability Control (VSC) suppresses a sudden loss of vehicle stability during cornering; and when on an incline the Hill-Assist Control (HAC) system will temporarily keep the vehicle from rolling back. So if you are needing a commuting vehicle, this one is for you. With full Dekra roadworthy and condition report. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.description: THE FUTURE IS FOR EVERYONE -  And this 2016 Opel Astra is waiting just for you. Although the Astra 1.0T Essentia foregoes some of the shiny chrome bits of its more expensive competitors, it remains an attractive offering. LED detailing still features in the headlamps, for example, and the plastic covers of the 16-inch steel wheels do an admirable job of mimicking flashy alloy items. Inside it's a similar story. The cabin gets a big push in the tech appeal division. Standard features include Bluetooth connectivity, aux-in and USB support. You also get a full complement of airbags (6), ABS with EBD, Isofix child-seat mounts, air-conditioning, cruise control, electric front windows and tyre pressure monitoring. A awesome stand out point of this Astra is its easy-driving nature. The clutch is light, the transmission slick and precise, and the steering effortless, yet accurate. It really makes for a very pleasurable driving experience. Overall a very exceptional buy from Opel. With a full Dekra roadworthy and condition report. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.description:
MOVEMENT THAT INSPIRES!!! - What is new on the Kia Picanto 1.0 Style?
The wheelbase on the Picanto has grown by 15mm, and the wheels have been pushed further out into the corners giving it a 25mm shorter front overhang. With this enhancement the Picanto looks more youthful and energetic. It sports a new tiger-nose grille and new angular wrap-around headlights. With new vertical lines being featured on the lower grille and air intakes, it gives the Picanto a bolder look. The interior has improved quite a bit making it look more modern and refined. The cabin features a new design, materials and larger dimensions. The Picanto comes standard with USB and Auxiliary ports. When it comes to comfort, the dashboard has been raised by 15mm, giving the driver and passenger some more legroom. The Picanto also now offers more legroom in the back and headroom. Very economical and a truly little all rounder, this vehicle is waiting for the student that is needing it. With full condition and roadworthy report from Dekra, you have total peace of mind in buying this vehicle. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.

attributes.title: 2020 Kia Picanto 1.0 Style

attributes.description: PASSION FOR LIFE!!! - The all popular 2018 Renault Clio IV 1.2T GT-Line carries many similar, race-inspired traits in its design. The front bumper appears wider and more purposeful with a larger, more pronounced diamond-shaped logo. With 17-inch alloy wheels, mirror covers, side sills and trimmings below the taillights. Below these is a redesigned diffuser element in the same titanium grey, creating the presence of width and stability. The interior has been lifted to separate the GT-Line from the rest of the range so that you're reminded of the differences. The GT-Line is fitted with a 7-inch touchscreen infotainments system that runs Renault's MediaNav, Bluetooth, AUX- and USB-inputs. This Clio range carries the highest accolade of a full 5 stars rating being in the top five of the safest cars in the country. Fitted with 4 airbags and Anti-lock brakes, brake force distribution, emergency brake assist, traction control and hill start assist. Finally, it is the sporty looking car without the harsh ride, exorbitant fuel consumption and impracticality and rather delivers a sensible approach for those who still want to have fun. The peace-of-mind that comes with the five-star rating and all the safety equipment is comforting and allows for relaxed driving, all while enjoying the convenience that the GT-Line has to offer. With a full Dekra condition and roadworthy report. Please note that the price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
